article_title: Why Political Leaders Need To Focus On Voters' Fears And Anger Rather Than Policies

article_metadata.description: Looking at the spectacle of the U.S. presidential race from the safety of Britain, it is tempting to voice that old rejoinder “Only in America.” But the continued march of the “outsiders” Donald Trump and Bernie Sanders at the expense of “establishment” politicians – which is causing such discomfort among [...]
